plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit

No. 02-1953

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

              BRIAN GOODINE, a/k/a DWAYNE GOODINE,

                      Defendant, Appellant.



                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court, issued on April 9, 2003, should be
amended as follows:

     On page 12, line 2, delete "is entitled 'Penalties' and".
